article: I have a friend, Linda. Linda is  an English  girl. She is  _  years old. She lives with  _  parents .She studies in a middle school near her home. Her classes begin at eight o'clock in the morning. She usually  gets up  at six thirty in the morning. And she washes  _  seven fifteen. Then she has breakfast. She  goes to  school at seven thirty. In the afternoon, the classes begin at two o'clock. There are only two  _  in the afternoon. She can  goes home  at five o'clock. In the evening, she usually  does  her homework and watches TV. She goes to  _  bed at 10:30.
